2025-06-03|Approximately 90% of household dust is made up of dead skin cells.
2025-06-03|According to a Harvard School of Public Health study, nearly twice as many people commit suicide in the 15 states in the US with the highest gun ownership rates than in the six states with the lowest rates.
2025-06-03|The human brain is 80% water.
2025-06-03|A pipe organ was the loudest sound that could be made in the year 1600.
2025-06-03|The average bra size today is 36C. Ten years ago it was 34B.
2025-06-03|The longest living cells in the body are brain cells which can live an entire lifetime.
2025-06-03|Mel Blanc (the voice of Bugs Bunny) was allergic to carrots.
2025-06-03|The town of Kennesaw, Georgia has required its citizens to own a firearm and ammunition since 1982.
2025-06-03|There are 50 million abortions performed every year world-wide. An estimated 40% of those are performed illegally.

2025-06-03|The blue whale can produce sounds up to 188 decibels. This is the loudest sound produced by a living animal and has been detected as far away as 530 miles.

2025-06-03|The microwave was invented after a researcher walked by a radar tube and a chocolate bar melted in his pocket.

2025-06-03|Your stomach has to produce a new layer of mucus every two weeks otherwise it will digest itself.
2025-06-03|The average person has 100,000 hairs on his/her head. Each hair grows about 5 inches (12.7 cm) every year.
2025-06-03|Ewan McGregor was offered, but turned down, the part of Neo in the Matrix. Will Smith was also approached to play Neo but turned it down in order make Wild Wild West.

2025-06-03|china has about $1 trillion in personal savings and a savings rate of close to 50%. The US has about $158 billion in personal savings and an average savings rate of only about 2%.
2025-06-03|Your skin completely renews itself every 28 days.
2025-06-03|In 2006, the U.S. was the largest Internet market in the world with 182 million users. China was second with 134 million users.
2025-06-03|In 1994, there were four murders and eight attempted murders of abortion providers in the United States. In 2004, there were zero.
